system.description: This spell functions like minor creation, except that you can also create an object of mineral nature: stone, crystal, metal, or the like. The duration depends on the material. Vegetable matter is 1 day/level; stone, crystal, or metal is 1 hour/level; other materials have durations between those. The maximum volume created is 1 cubic foot per caster level. You cannot create creatures or items that ordinarily require a high degree of craftsmanship (weapons, armor, glass, etc.). The quality of items made with this spell is average.

components.materialDescription: A tiny piece of matter of the same sort of item you plan to create (e.g. a thread for cloth, a splinter for wood).

system.target: Unattended, nonmagical object of nonliving matter up to 1 cu. ft./level
